under the dark bed , i wake up

DLG a
I'm a cat

DLG b
its my bed , on the sky pillar. there is something under the bed.

DLG d
"dont tell anyone. a secret is a key to both your doom , or your heaven. on this bed exist a secret place. organic or not  find this place and meet exodus himself."

DLG e
why? why do you leave me?

DLG f
i dont want to die , but you let me

DLG g
why? i just want to be alive

DLG i
im tired of this exhausting expresion of mine and i cant take it anymore

END 0
its a beautifull view , isnt it?
